articles.author: Gabriel Gavin
articles.title: Zelenskyy addresses Biden’s ‘President Putin’ gaffe on Europe tour - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Ukrainian president praised Washington for providing support to help defend his country against Russian aggression.
articles.content: While the 81-year-old Democrat quickly corrected himself, the gaffe has fueled speculation about his fitness for office ahead of the U.S. presidential election in November, with dozens of his own all… [+785 chars]
